unlockSecret: Unlock the Secret to Vibrant and Luscious Hair
stressDescription: In times of stress, our scalp can become tense, hindering blood circulation and affecting hair health.
amalfiDescription: Amalfi works wonders by boosting blood flow to the follicles, relieving tension, and delivering vital nutrients that foster the growth of resilient, voluminous, and radiant hair.
amalfiEnhancement: Amalfi enhances scalp blood circulation, delivering ample oxygen and nutrients to the follicles. Promotes healthier hair, reduces thinning
amalfiEnhancementhair: Amalfi enhances hair thickness and density by elongating hair follicle cells, stimulating the growth of thicker, more voluminous hair.
amalfiPurification: Amalfi gently purifies the scalp, eliminating dry skin, flakes, and residue, promoting a balanced and revitalized scalp for optimal hair health.
scalpMassageBenefits: A scalp massage offers unparalleled rejuvenation and relaxation, bringing about lowered blood pressure, heart rate, and stress hormone levels.
amalfiEffectiveness: Moreover, Amalfi effectively alleviates stress-induced headaches by releasing tension and inducing a state of deep relaxation.
activationInstructions: Activate device, glide gently over entire scalp. Adjust speed using power button.
massageInstructions: Massage 5 minutes daily, on wet or dry hair. For thorough cleansing, use during shampooing.
enhanceResults: Enhance results with hair oil. Jojoba or sweet almond recommended to avoid pore congestion.
